name: TipLink
introduce: TipLink is a lightweight wallet designed to make transferring digital assets as easy as sending a link. Someone with crypto can create a TipLink and send that link to anyone over any platform (text, discord, email, etc). Once a user has connected their wallet to TipLink, they can deposit funds and then transfer ownership by sharing a link. Each transaction creates a new wallet, too, so the recipient needn't download a new browser extension or app to use the money. And, if the recipient doesn’t claim the funds, the sender can still reclaim them.
